questions.question: Among the butane conformers, when viewed about C 2 -C 3 bond, which occur at energy minima on a graph of potential energy versus dihedral angle?
Is Laplace transformation can be preferred to obtain the transfer function in RLC network?
The initial condition of the given RLC network need not to be zero while deriving the overall transfer function using Laplace transformation.
The open loop transfer function of any unity feedback open loop system is (2s^2 + 6s + 5)/((s+1)^2 * (s+2)) . The characteristic equation of the closed loop system is _____.
The second derivative input signals modify which of the following?

answers.a: The time constant of the system
answers.d: The time constant and suppress the oscillations

explanations.a: speed of response will be less
explanations.b: speed of response will be less
explanations.c: speed of response will be less
explanations.d: speed of response will be more
